artist: Maker: Henry Chawner; Maker: John Emes
description: covered sauce tureen; number is worn
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

Each cover is engraved with crest of a maiden\'s head affronter couped below the shoulder proper, a crest used by some ten families in Britain.
markings:
Marks

Body fully marked by Henry Chawner for 1795-96 on underside.  Cover fully marked by Chawner and Emes for 1796-97.
title: Covered sauce tureen
